availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Marquis (Boone County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, farmer. Boone County, Kentucky, native. Son of Elizabeth Marquis. Married to Maria Louise Hagish Marquis. Father of Ernsline Marquis, Emma Marquis, Henry Edgar Marquis, Lila Marquis, and Ethel May Marquis. Resident in Boone County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Boone County in 1860. Employed John Smith in Boone County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Boone County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Florence District, p. 93A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Florence, p. 190B.
